definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: As it turns out, a handful of scientific studies show that chicken soup really could have medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 而且几项科学研究也表明，鸡汤的确具有药用价值。

sentences.english: The mangosteen fruit has a long history of medicinal use in Chinese and Ayurvedic medicine.
sentences.chinese: 山竹果在中医和印度草药医学里的药用历史悠久。

sentences.english: Resources of medicinal plants in the Chishui Alsophila Natural Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 赤水桫椤自然保护区药用植物资源。

sentences.english: Finally, the molecular distillation is performed to obtain medical-grade high-purity glycerin.
sentences.chinese: 最后进行分子蒸馏，得到药用级的高纯度的甘油。

sentences.english: Lu Ding tea, medicinal value and nutrients from the benefit of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 路丁茶从药用价值与营养元素上造福人类。

sentences.english: The Sargassum fusiforme setchell is rich in nutrition and has high value for food and medical purposes.
sentences.chinese: 羊栖菜营养丰富，食用及药用价值高。

sentences.english: Dendrobium officinale is a precious traditional Chinese herbal medicine which belongs to Dendrobium species, Orchidaceae.
sentences.chinese: 铁皮石斛为兰科石斛属植物，是一种名贵的药用植物。

sentences.english: Actinomycete microbes are the most important and largest class of microbes for medicinal usage up to date.
sentences.chinese: 放线菌是迄今最重要和最大的药用微生物种群。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To gain a clear idea on the resources of the medicinal plants of Lonicera L. (Caprifoliaceae) in Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查四川忍冬属药用植物的资源状况。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE Summarize the research progress on Phaeoporus obliquus.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍药用菌桦褐孔菌的研究进展。

sentences.english: A capillary GC method was established for determination of cetyl alcohol and stearyl alcohol in cetostearyl alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 建立了毛细管GC法测定药用辅料十六十八醇的含量。

sentences.english: The study and use of plants for medicinal purposes is the concern of herbalism .
sentences.chinese: 植物药用的研究与应用主要是草药学关注的焦点。

sentences.english: Bamboo fungus is not only nutritive, but also crisp.
sentences.chinese: 竹荪除食用外，还有着很高的药用价值。

sentences.english: A medicinal fluid rubbed into the skin to soothe pain or relieve stiffness.
sentences.chinese: 擦剂一种药用液体，擦进皮肤以减痛或减轻僵硬。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the extraction process for mycelia polysaccharides of fungi Phellinus igniarius.
sentences.chinese: 目的筛选药用真菌桑黄菌丝体多糖的最佳提取工艺。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Vaccaria segetalis is a valuable medicinal herb.
sentences.chinese: 结论王不留行是一种很有研究价值的药用植物。

definition: huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
manyprickle (Acanthopanax senticosus), root used in TCM
to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
